text: Adilson Aguero dos Santos (born August 22, 1990 in Maringá), commonly known as Adilson Maringá, is a Brazilian footballer who plays for Gama as goalkeeper. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|State League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Conmebol !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |valign="center"|Santa Helena |2012 |Goiano B |colspan="2"|—||4||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||4||0 |- |valign="center"|América–GO |2012 |Goiano C |colspan="2"|—||12||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||12||0 |- |rowspan=3 valign="center"|Rondonópolis |2013 |rowspan=2|Matogrossense |colspan="2"|—||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||0||0 |- |2014 |colspan="2"|—||4||0||1||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||5||0 |- !colspan="2"|Subtotal !0!!0!!4!!0!!1!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!5!!0 |- |valign="center"|Formosa |2015 |Brasiliense |colspan="2"|—||12||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||12||0 |- |valign="center"|Gama |2016 |Brasiliense |colspan="2"|—||1||0||6||0||colspan="2"|—||2All appearance(s) in Copa Verde||0||9||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !0!!0!!33!!0!!7!!0!!0!!0!!2!!0!!42!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Sociedade Esportiva do Gama players Category:People from Maringá
